content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS cal;

select name, location from sys.external_data_sources;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK ''calendar.csv'',
            DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
            FORMAT = ''CSV'',
            PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
            HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
            FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
            ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
        ) AS cal;'


SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        date_key INT,
        date DATE,
        year SMALLINT,
        month TINYINT,
        day TINYINT,
        day_name VARCHAR(10),
        day_of_year SMALLINT,
        week_of_month TINYINT,
        week_of_year TINYINT,
        month_name VARCHAR(10),
        year_month INT,
        year_week INT

    ) AS cal;
